content:
PHASE 0 COORDINATION

Parallel task assignments for Phase 0 (Foundation). Module ownership:

- Agent scaffold: owns Cargo.toml, workspace structure, CI, Docker files
- Agent types: owns notebook-core/src/types.rs, notebook-core/src/lib.rs
- Agent store: owns notebook-store/*, migrations/*, AGE graph schema
- Agent crypto: owns notebook-core/src/crypto.rs, notebook-core/src/identity.rs

RULES:
1. Each agent must stay within their owned files
2. If you need to add a dependency another agent owns, WRITE a request entry
3. Agent scaffold must complete workspace structure before others can compile
4. Agents types, store, crypto depend on scaffold completing first
author: orchestrator
